content: @jenlampton I've made a few issues/branches in Stripe in case you want to test before we release. Basically I tried to copy changes from the Drupal version and also update the Stripe PHP bindings. It seems to be working fine on a dev site but thought you might want to test on any site you're currently using the module on.

https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/stripe/issues

backdrop-contrib/stripe
This module provides a simple abstraction to use the Stripe PHP SDK. - backdrop-contrib/stripe

@jenlampton I have ported and done some early testing on uc_stripe and as part of the port I'm making it dependent on stripe to bundle the Stripe library. Would you have time in the near future to test the last few branches/issues I posted, or are you comfortable with me making an initial release of stripe after merging them in if it is working for me?

https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/uc_stripe

backdrop-contrib/uc_stripe
Ubercart payment gateway module for Stripe. Contribute to backdrop-contrib/uc_stripe development by creating an account on GitHub.

https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/stripe/issues/18

Update Stripe libraries 路 Issue #18 路 backdrop-contrib/stripe
Currently bundling v5.7.0 of Stripe libraries but most recent release is v7.29.0 -- we should update.
